app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1660-3397/17/3/139/s1, Table S1: Fatty acids content from fish oils recovered from different by-products of SB and H fish discards; Table S2: Amino acids content of FPHs produced from SB and H by-products from fish discards; Table S3: Composition of the culture media used for the fermentation of P. acidilactici; Figure S1. Costs of the metabolites generated by P. acidilactici growing in MRS and low-cost media; Figure S2: Flowchart of fish discards valorization.
